title: International Migrants in England and Wales
metaDescription: Using 2011 Census data, we look at international migrants in England and Wales.  Analysis by country of birth and passports held are reported at national, regional and local levels. Main findings show an increase in the number of residents who were born outside the UK, with 13% of residents born outside the UK in 2011, compared with just 9% in 2001. The most common non-UK countries of birth in 2011 were India, Poland and Pakistan.
